attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I wanted to ask "if the RBS or HBOS go bankrupt, who will honour their banknotes", but instead of directly asking the PM, I was directed to YouTube.
I tried all anograms, but couldnt get the solution for YouTube to be Gordon Brown.
Keep it simple...if the electorate come here....dont fob them off with Youtube so that you can later say that there was a communication error.

rejection.details: If you have a problem with any of the Number 10 websites, please contact admin@number10.gov.uk directly.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
